thread.section_title: AMR Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AMR | amr.com.au
thread.title: Jacquie Moffat

author: Jacquie Moffat
title: Jacquie Moffat
text:
First of all, my experience with AMR was great - I received my order the next day after ordering at about 2pm the day before. The product was well packed.
My issue is that there isn't an option for cheaper/longer delivery ie $10 delivery and receive package within 5 working days. I was going to order more of the product I ordered, but didn't because the flat delivery rate of $20 was actually more expensive than the product itself.
I will be buying more from AMR, their prices are very reasonable - just have to space the purchases out more so I can afford them.
